Name: UpSort
Description: Similar products comparison website build using Web Scraping and NextJS. Implemented server-side logic using Puppeteer and Cheerio alongside API development to extract product information from e-commerce website

Name: QuickChat
Description: Real time chat application built using MERN stack and Websocket.Implemented email-based search and connection features, along with real-time communication in both one-on-one and group chat using Socket.IO integration.

Name: BTrans
Description: Blockchain Based (Ethereum) Cryptocurrency exchange and transfer application build on Testnet(Goerile,Polygon,Sepolia)

Name: NFT Marketplace
Description: Developed marketplace for selling and buying non-fungible tokens, built on ERC721. Addressed challenges in the traditional art and collectibles market by leveraging blockchain technology to ensure authenticity and ownership verification of digital assets.

Name: Healthcare
Description: Online Docter Consultation Website Purely Based On MERN Stack.

Name: Portfolio
Description: Portfolio Running on Both WEB3 And WEB2
